summarize_default: Summarize the key takeaways from the Q3 Financial Report.
summarize_long: Provide a long and detailed summary of the main points in the Security Advisory document.
slack_reply: Give me a concise Slack-style summary of the product features from the Data Sheet.
executive_email: Draft a formal email to leadership summarizing the new project proposal.
direct_answer: What is the capital expenditure for the last quarter mentioned in the Q3 report?
